Free Form Options
1.content: Choose one of the four options listed in the description or craft your own with option 5 (note 5 will lead to a branching tree in order to give writers more than one option)
1.title: The Trial Begins

choices: ignore him
Yell at him
threaten him while Stephane is away
11.content:
Once, a long time ago, John had been a human being but those days were so distant, they'd faded like forgotten dreams. He no longer knew the light of the sun and could barely remember it. All he knew was the damp dark of what had begun as his prison but become his world.

Only a year ago, John had known a great life. His grades in High School were stellar, the wrestling team was going to State in all weight classes (his included) and he'd met the perfect girl. Well, almost perfect. Stephane was a dream, beautiful, sweet, and innocent, but her siblings, they were another story. Her thirteen year old sister, Jill, was a braniac, a total recluse who spent all her time in the basement. Not only was she a braniac but a total geek who sported thick glasses and a face full of acne. Stephane's, eight year old sister was the complete opposite, of course, a complete tom boy, you often wondered from the look of her if she ever showered. Wearing a pair of blue jean overalls at all times, she was never to be seen without a outer covering of mud or dust, from the rough games she played with neighborhood boys. Youngest, but by no means least annoying, was her six year old brother, Joey. Having decided that you with your rusted out Volkswagon are the epitome of cool, he follows you everywhere through Stephanes home, even interuppting you and your girlfriend during... intimate moments.

How should you deal with Joey? Note: by choosing you are also choosing how much of a douche John is and therefore the tone and direction of the story to come
11.title: John

choices: Curiosity overcomes  you, check out her lab.
On second thought I'm here to see my girl's boobs, not her sister's test tubes
111.content: You try your best to ignore or avoid Stephane's irritating and in some instances repugnant siblings, but, particularly in Joey's case, the task was nigh impossible. One day, while you were waiting around for Steph, you grew tired of Joey's constant presence. “Hey why dont you go get us some cokes,” you tell the kid and he jogs off with a wide grin. As soon as he rounds the corner you look for a suitable hiding spot. Your eyes find the basement door. Noone ever went into the basement, since thats where Jill did... whatever it was the nerd did down there, but the nerd wasn't home, so what could it hurt to just wait down there a few minutes.
111.title: Ignorance is Bliss

choices: You awake with the world towering over you, one inch tall
You awake to a world of blurry monoliths upon an endless gray plain, one cm.
You awake in midair, floating through a void, near microscopic
1111.content:
Stealthily you scurry over to the basement door and slip down into the dark, making sure to shut the door firmly beehind you. For a few seconds you fumble about for the light, then your fingers find a chain and you pull it. Your jaw drops. You knew she was some sort of a brain but never....

The room you step down in to is a fully functional laboratory. Its computers and monitering stations seemed to be oriented around a central compartment similar in dimensions to a phone booth. As you walked closer you are reminded of the movie the fly where the inventor builds chambers to teleport matter with disasterous results. In this lab there is only one, however. Resisting your better judgement you walk inside, “roomy,” you say to noone in particular. As you turn about, you lay your hand on the wall and sudenly the door slides shut upon you. You raise your hand observing with dread the red button that sits underneath. Powercells hum to life and the chamber becomes charged with enough static to stand your hair on end. “This is the end,” you think as the hum of the power cells crest to a peak. A bright flash fills the room, followed by darkness.
1111.title: The Accident

choices: Hitch a ride with Ari
Stay in the room and wait for Jill
11112.content:
Standing in front of the stairs, you sighed. It'd be impossible to climb them like in this state. You shook your head. This "state" you were in was all because you couldn't leave well enough alone.

It wasn't too hard to figure out that you''d shrunk. The towering pillars of lab equipment were a pretty big giveaway. That, and there was a ruler painted on the base of the shrinking machine. Handy.

Panic hasn't set in yet, likely since you're at least partially convinced this is a dream. People can't really be a centimeter tall, and thirteen year olds can't build shrink rays. This was all some sort of crazy fever dream. Just like Scrooge said in "A Christmas Carol," this was likely from some undigested meal.

Of course, Scrooge was also wrong. A pounding came from up the staircase. You pressed against the bottom step, unwilling to admit the reality but still not wanting any trouble. The pounding quickly came closer, until it was right over your head. Then, as quickly as it started, it stopped.

Of course it was nothing. You mentally chastise yourself for believing such fantasy. Chuckling, you gaze up and stop cold. Curled around the top of the step were ten giant socked toes.

In a heartbeat, the two feet hop forward, landing between you and the room. "Jill, you in here? 'Was wondering if you knew how to fix a shoe." The girl took a step forward, peering around the room.

Of course you recognized her. It was Stephanie's eight year old tomboy sister. Arizona. Based on how she wasn't too interested in the equipment, it seemed she also knew about this room. Maybe she could fix you. But to do that, you'd need her attention...
11112.title: Coming to terms

choices: You can go, but you're bathing when you get back."
You need to bathe before you do anything."
111121.content:
Not wasting any time, you lunge forward and grab onto the socked foot. You immediately regret this, as you remember's Ari's policy on baths: few to none. The stench is nearly overwhelming, but you manage to grab onto some of the frayed fibers and secure a position. If you made it out of this, you'd be talking to her about her hygiene.

Seemingly satisfied that Jill was not in the lab, she turned and climbed the stairs. It was rough, forcing you to wrap your arms further into the sock's fabric. Even still, your body flopped against Arizona's sweaty sock with every step. You'd be puking soon if this didn't finish up.

It does, with the feet stopping momentarily. You peer up, trying to clear your head a little and see what was going on. To your horror, Ari's red, white and blue converse towered over you. Her right foot, the one you weren't attached to, shot right into the shoe. She didn't even bother putting it on right, crushing the back of the shoe with her heel and leaving the laces loosely tied.

It was your ride's turn. It flew into the air, aimed right at the open shoe. You scream, not wanting to be sealed in that hell-scape.

"Hold on young woman. Where are you going?"

The foot pulled back, landing with a thud on the ground. You look over, seeing the familiar pink slipper's of Stephanie's mom. Her voice was loud and clear, and it was directed at Arizona.

Ari began to shuffle her feet, shaking you back and forth. She mumbled out, "Friends. Gonna play."

A tut came from up above. "When was the last time you cleaned yourself. Let me smell you." Her slipper stepped closer as the mother leaned in.

You hear a sigh from above. "Ari...
111121.title: Tag Along

choices: Jill
Steph's 8 year old sister
11113.content:
His eyes began to steadily open. Still stunned a bit from the bright light that him, he managed to fully open them, but the vision was blurry. Unable to make out his location. All he saw was grey and white. John also felt his own body floating in midair, how could it be? Questions swarmed his mind as he continued to rub his eyes to clear his vision.

Once the view was clear, all John could was stare in fear. The entire lab was a lot bigger, big enough where he could easily get himself lost. ''So that's what that crap does..'' he said to himself as he looked at his hands, then turning from side to side, then to look below him. He was floating in midair, he was scared out of his mind. He waved his arms and legs around trying to grab hold onto anything, but he was too far to even reach anything, and floor was miles away from him. John asked himself, ''What am I going to do!? I can't even be seen at this size!'' He had the fear of being erased from the world. His heart raced, he sweated as he continued to move around. He soon stopped as he knew his hopes were useless.

John, just floated in the air, seeing bits of dust fly passed him, wondering, what was he going to do now? Soon.. he heard a loud scratching sound, the door, someone was coming in. John looked around at the massive door. In came in..
11113.title: A new perspective

choices: PE (gym)
Spanish
Biology
Sex Ed
Special Ed
12.content:
**Note: This chapter originally written by Mr.E http://www.writing.com/main/portfolio/vi...**

You’ve been the principal of this school for a couple of years now and the children don’t exactly like you too much. That’s because as soon as you became principal you made sure that everyone was to fear you and obey the rules that you've enforced. It’s not that you were a mean guy it’s just if you acted too nice with them, they would’ve thought they could get away with anything they wanted because you were such a weakling.

You were nice to the students who got straight A's and the members of the honor society, but sometimes you thought that they were only pretending to like you back and their smiles seemed forced. But it didn’t matter as long as you kept your school working properly with no behavioral codes being broken.

Now you had to do your morning inspections of the classrooms and make sure no one was acting out of line or they would receive a detention so fast the kid wouldn’t know what hit him. you peer in a window and see one class is already in progression and sneak along the side of the wall so no one can see you enter and you can observe them without the students knowing you're there. As you watch the preteens act in their normal manner, a strange sensation is overcoming your body and it feels like your bones are getting smaller and more compacted.

The class you are in is.....
12.title: The Disciplinarian

choices: You fall out onto the floor.
You become caught in the bundle of clothes.
You fall out but land somewhere on the now giantess Kim.
121.content:
You feel your suit loosening around your body, then suddenly everything goes black. But, you haven't passed out, your head has just fallen below the neckline of your jacket. 'Am I.. shrinking.. This can't be possible.' It was possible, as the weight from your ever growing clothes attested. The fabric soon collapsed on top of you in an avalanche of tweed driving you down into darkness. Now you're falling down a long black tunnel, naked and frightened beyond imagining. Collisions with the fabric walls of the shaft slowed your descent and you land rather gently in a pitch black cave whose odor is familiar... 'My foot powder... my... shoe.' Before you had time to orient yourself within your new surroundings the entire cave shook, sending you tumbling out of its entrance and into the tangled folds of your unoccupied garments.

Above


Kim nearly tripped over something, she was always tripping over things. Adjusting her glasses which had slid down her nose when she staggered, she looked down to see what it was this time. She expected a dodge ball, it was gym after all; what she found instead was a pile of clothes. A suit and slacks along with a shiny pair of dress shoes. They didn't look like any student's clothes. Not even the preppies were that preppy. Eternally the 'good girl' Kim reached down and gathered up the clothing, intent on taking it to lost and found.
121.title: Fall from Power

choices: The other shoe.
A crack in the floor.
Author's choice
1211.content: You slide out of the cavern you now realize is your pant leg as it is hefted up above you. The hard landing on the gym floor turns your unprotected but numb and you look up to see a titanic teenager trodding off with your only shelter. Overcoming your awe at the sheer size of this girl you once looked down upon you raise your voice to all her. A gust of wind totally masks your voice and you watch as a dustbunny as big around as a monster-truck wheel rolls by. Its then that you realize how small you really were, a moment later you realize you are naked. You don't have much time to look for replacement garments before a shoe slams down nearby. Shockwaves from the impact send you flying but you are so scared of being crushed you land running. With a shriek nothing but cockroaches can hear you run from the children you once held under your dictatorial thumb. Unfortunately you don't realize your running right into...
1211.title: Naked and Exposed

choices: You decide to hitch a ride on Kim's shoe and try your best to get her attention.
Enter Brandy, the punk girl you recently suspended.
12111.content: ...her other shoe. A wall of rigid rubber, hits you and you rebound back against the rough gym floor. 'Rough?' you think, 'Mrs. Cole just waxed it.... Just how small am I?' For the first time you look up and take in the true enormity of the world. Miles above florescent lights shine like distant stars. Even the foot of the student beside you presents an immense cliff-face. To the girl above who becomes a blur past her colossal white thighs, you must be no more than a speck upon the gym floor. You don't even bother shouting. One might as well yell at the moon. You used to hold the attention of each and every student in this school with the morning announcements, now he wondered how he would even get the attention of one of them. 'What am I going to do...?"
12111.title: A New World

choices: She's there because she's the one who shrunk you
She's there to find the bitch who stole her boyfriend and torture her
121112.content: Above you the huge girl begins to walk away taking your empty garments with her. The updraft from her shoe leaving the floor nearly sucks you off your feet. Suddennly your alone, but not for long, shockwaves from impending footsteps, knock you onto your ass. You look up and see a pair of black high laced boots enter your field of vision. Even shrunk to the size of a speck you couldn't mistake the shoes of your nemesis, the shoes which had scuffed the gym floor countless times before today. 'Brandy,' you grumbled. No other student had seen the inside of your office more, no other student had received so many days of detention. Her face loomed so far above that you couldn't make it out, but your memory could reconstruct every detail. Short frizzy pink hair and a pale face that could almost be cute were it not for her ostentatious nose ring. Even if you could contact the little punk, you wouldn't. God only knows what she would do to you especially considering her recent suspension... 'Suspension? Wait, she shouldn't even be here today??'
121112.title: Punk Goddess

choices: Hide beside the only object nearby and where she would least expect, her boot
Too late the punk's eyes lock on you
1211121.content: "Now where did he go to?" Brandy's murmur is more like thunder to your tiny ears and her eyes searching the gym floor are more like moons in orbit. "Come on out Mr. Principal," she coos mockingly, "I just want to see you." Your heart sinks as you realize there can be drawn only one conclusion from her words, Brandy did this to you! You don't know how but you sure as heck know why. The girl despises you. To her you are a symbol of patriarchal authority and now here you stand, naked as the day you were born and smaller than a grain of rice. You feel as vulnerable, as... well, as a student must feel on the other side of your desk. Perhaps that's the lesson Brandy means to teach you, what it feels to be powerless under someone else's control. If so you mean to end class before it begins and the only way to do that is to hide. Your eyes pan out across the gym floor, an endless and unobstructed plane of polished hickory. Where could anyone, even an insect of your size hide upon such an exposed surface?
1211121.title: Role Reversal

choices: ....her palm
....her tongue
12111212.content:
Searching the floor Brandy sees what at first she takes to be a tiny mote of dust, but the longer her eyes focus the more the speck takes on a humanoid shape. Below, you see the once unruly student turned Goddess begin to kneel. Her shadow blackens the wooden plane around you like the descent of a giant asteroid. Though your brain is screaming at your legs to run, your lower body only responds by releasing the constraints on your bladder. Warm urine streams down your naked skin as a hand the size of your school hovers overhead.

"Heh you shrunk even more than I thought?" Brandy's whisper is to you an indiscernable howl and your hands clap to your ears to keep from going deaf. "Lets be careful I don't smoosh you..." Her thumb and forefinger descend on either side of you as you stand weak and helpless as an insect. As they draw near they transform in walls of ridged flesh. Whatever scream you might have uttered is muffled by the hard yet warm walls as they close in on you. The force twists your head and body sideways nearly breaking your fragile neck. Though you can see nothing but the shadows of Brandy's mammoth fingerprints after your capture, you can feel the acceleration as you are undoubtably whisked upward. When finally you are released you brace yourself for a fall that could be miles from your tiny perspective. Instead you land shortly upon...
12111212.title: Captured

choices: ...in my boots."
...up my nose."
121112121.content:
A short scream escapes your lips as the walls of flesh separate and you begin your fall. Your voice is jarred to a stop however when you land bouncing upon a soft, slightly slick surface. Looking around you realize the surface is her pale open palm and the slickness her sweat -- gross. Above you the girl's face looms. The face you've seen across your desk countless times now looks down at you sneering like someone who's discovered a disgusting insect. You recoil in fear at the giant girl's face made all the more intimidating by her bull-style nose ring. The thunder which follows must be her laughter.

"Look at you Deeds, not even a freshmen would be afraid of you now." She smiled seeing you hold your ears against her deafening words. "I've thought long and hard about what I was going to do with you if it actually worked and I've decided you're not fit for any life resembling human existence. No, you're much more fit for the life of a parasite, so thats what you will be. Take a good look Deeds because this is the last time you'll ever see the light of day. You're going to spending the rest of your miserable life...
121112121.title: Parasite

choices: Deeds is now trapped beneath her toes.
Deeds is now trapped beneath her sole.
1211121211.content: Brandy checks around to make sure no one is watching. Then she reaches for Deeds. Seeing the tiny speck fleeing across her palm at a snails pace makes her laugh. Ever so carefully she pinches the speck between her fingers. "Amazing, you're so small I can barely feel you. I guess thats good, I don't want you to tickle me as your searching around for food inside my shoe." Her words make her wonder for a moment about what Deeds would eat and drink to survive in the dark confines of her boot, but she decided she didn't really care. Bending over she undid the steel buckles and slid out her pale bare foot. Catching a whiff of the putrid odor only made her smile more, imagining what it will be like for the tiny principal. Once she had placed the little being who was once a man gently on the sole she gave the shoe a good shake to send him down to the toe end -- she didn't want to crush him after all, that would end his suffering far to soon. Once she was sure the little Deeds was far from where her calloused heel would land she slipped her foot slowly back in. Once she had the boot securely buckled she wiggled her toes but could feel nothing. Still she smiled knowing that her nemesis for the past three years was now trapped with no possibility of escape and his only company would be her sweaty unwashed foot.
1211121211.title: Your New World

choices: You manage to scramble to the far side before Brandy's toe comes down.
You are still in the depression when the toe descends.
12111212111.content: From the dark confines of Brandy's boot, the once principal Deeds watches with growing dread as a shadow falls over his one source of light. The stitched leather interior turns dark and cave like as the shadow nears. Frozen like an animal you can only gape as five pale toes enter his world. Each is at least the size of a house from his perspective and christened with the chipped remains of their last pink polish. When they wiggle, no doubt in anticipation, you snap out of your trance. Shrieking, you turn and run for the toe of the boot. Although your bare feet are slick from the moist insole, they carry you at break-neck speed across the swampy floor. Within no time, however, the Goddess sized toes over take you. You dare a glance behind only to see Brandy's big toe advancing like a glacier. A final scream escapes your lips before you trip and fall into a crater sized depression.
12111212111.title: Deeds is now trapped beneath her toes.

choices: Her toe relaxes relieving some of the pressure.
Her foot presses down even harder.
121112121112.content: A girlish shriek escapes your lips as the toe descends. In its shadow you realize what the crater you had fallen into is -- a toe-print. Through a tiny hole in the boot enough light streams in for your to see your destroyer. The bottom of her big toe is rough, flaked with dead skin and ringed by yellowy callous. 'Jesus, hasn't this punk bitch ever heard of a pedicure.' This happens to be your last coherent thought before the toe presses you flat. For a long moment you sink into the soft insole beneath you. The fabric squelches releasing the morning's stored sweat onto your naked body. You struggle against your humiliating predicament but one might as well fight against an avalanche. Brandy, the little punk is now a force of nature and you, you are less than an insect unlucky enough to be caught beneath her. As the toe continues to press down you sink further into the shoe's fetid floor. The sweat now rises like a tide to your chest and then past your mouth. Spluttering you fight for breath but only manage to swallow what seems to be gallons of the punk girl's stale foot sweat.
121112121112.title: A Fitting Place for a Fascist

choices: Run as far as you can toward the toe-end of the shoe.
Seek shelter beneath her feet
1211121211121.content:
Just as you swear your body is going to burst the massive ridged ceiling of flesh above begins to rise. For a second you rise along with it, your naked body stuck like dirt to the moist pad of her toe. A few struggles manage to dislodge you, though, and you fall down onto the swampy boot floor with a loud, from your perspective, splat! Your chest, now able to expand, takes in a much needed breath but you soon find yourself gagging. Brandy's boot smelled much worse with her foot inside, her bare foot no less. Still this was the only air you had so you inhaled it all the same filling your lungs with her strong odor. By the time you'd caught your breath your eyes were literally tearing from the smell.

Looking around you note that the light streaming in from microscopic cracks still affords you a dim vision of your predicament. In front of you is a tight cave formed by the arch of her toes and walled in by the ball of her foot, behind a narrow space between Brandy's overgrown toenails and the end of the shoe. Your mind races wondering which way to run. Either way might spell your doom. Under her toes you might be squeezed into paste, in front of them you might be gored by her gargantuan nails. You had to decide as her toe could crush you again at any moment.
1211121211121.title: Decisions

choices: You awake a few hours later still stuck to Brandy's big toe.
You awake many hours later alone in her boot.
12111212111211.content: Fear gets the better of you and you scramble toward the end of her boot, trying to put as much distance as you can between yourself and Brandy's toes. Before you emerge from their dark shadow, however, they descend once more threatening to trap you again. You look up, see the callous rimmed bottom of her big toe and scream like a child. The sound is muffled when the wall of rough skin presses you flat and forces the air out of your lungs. Thankfully you don't have to endure the torture for long because you soon faint from a mixture of fear and oxygen deprivation.
12111212111211.title: He choose....poorly

choices: Try the climb, maybe its easier than it looks...?
Juryrig a tool to saw through the boot leather
121112121112112.content:
You awake to darkness. For a moment the horror of your nightmare remains with you, but soon enough reason intrudes reminding you that everything has been a dream. You sigh with relief and move to slide off your matress, but you can't find the edge? Desperately you reach with your arms and legs but all you feel is an ever-expanding soft, slightly moist surface. Then the smell hits you and your eyes, adjusting to the dark, spy the inside of a stitched leather cave. "Oh God.." you breathe. It was real... It..is..real. This is that punk Brandy's boot.

Your mind races back through the events you now realize are no dream and recalls getting crushed before passing out. How long have I been out, how long have I been in here? Your stomach answers you with a grumble. Not only were you hungry, you were thirsty too -- your mouth dry, your lips cracked. If Brandy's foot didn't kill you starvation or dehydration will. I can't survive here without food or water, you conclude, and start looking for a way out.

You walk down to the heel of the boot, the logical place for an escape. The length of the boot's sole is equivalent to a city block at your scale. When you reach its end you look disparingly up along the sheer cliffs that lead to freedom. Then you look down at your pasty saggy naked figure. You had never been the athletic type, and even if you were, you doubt an Olympian could make such a climb. No, you would need to find another way out.
121112121112112.title: Just a Dream?

choices: You make it to the toe and escape Brandy's foot.
You can't make it and caught under her sock.
1211121211121121.content:
After searching the boot thoroughly and finding nothing but a solid cave of dank leather, you decide climbing, as difficult as it might be, is your only option. You start at the heel wedging your microscopic fingers into tiny cracks in the leather. Then slowly but surely you begin to pull your body up. By the time you've scaled your own height, the equivalent of a centimeter or two, your sweating and panting. Willpower fuels your continued climb but even that can not save you when the boot starts to shake. A girlish scream escapes your lips as you fall backward. Thankfully the worn insole is relatively soft punishes you with nothing worse than bruises. When you look up, however, you see something far worse filling the circular sky, a ratty pink sock.

"Oh God," you say to yourself, "I totally lost track of the time." Suddenly surging with adrenaline, you sprint toward the toe of the boot and salvation.
1211121211121121.title: Climbing and Bad Timing

choices: Brandy misses her bus and bikes to school.
Brandy goes to school as usual.
12111212111211211.content:
The socked foot pursues you like a pink tsunami, a towering wall of frayed fabric. Screaming in fear for your now pathetic life you flee from the mere body part of a punk girl whose future you once held in the palm of you hand. Now, if you didn't move fast enough, she'd hold your future on the sole of her foot. Before you lay her toe prints, pond sized depressions in the insole. Desperate to escape a flattened fate beneath Brandy's foot you dive toward them. Unfortunately your feeble legs don't even propel you to the edge of the print. You lay in despair as the roar of the sliding foot overcomes you and the sky turns pink then dark.

It takes you a few moments to realize you aren't dead. When you do, you unfold your naked body from a fetal position and feel around. Apparently, luck landed you in an open space between the ball of the girl's foot and the pads of her toes. Above you can feel a coarse cieling of fabric and around the stale air of the shoe, quickly warming in the presence of the giantess foot. Falling back upon the insole, you thank God for sparring your pathetic life, yet even if you could continue to evade Brandy's crushing foot, more mundane problems would eventually kill you. Your lips cracked and dry, begged for water and your stomach for food, rather more audibly, but where could you find food and water inside a high school girl's boot?
12111212111211211.title: The Onset of Thirst

choices: Give in.
No! You won't stoop  to that.
121112121112112111.content:
The fibers of the tight cave formed by Brandy's tattered sock rub your naked body as the punk girl reads her clock with a curse. There's no way she'd make it to the bus in time. She'd have to take her bike to school - and it was the hottest month of the year.

Your feeble form held loosely under the arch of the girl's toes, you shudder as they squeeze your bare skin. Old stale sweat welled up from the spongy insole. This teen giantess was a menace at regualr size, but now that you are small enough to see the fibers in her dirty pink sock, it was an entirely different matter.

With dread, you hear the ding of a bicycle bell. She must be trying to torment you - it was the hottest month of the year and she was going to bike to school? You grimace as the heat rises in the stale leather boot. The giantess's monolitic toes clench your body, their owner no doubt relishing the thought of her oppressor pinned beneath her dirty unwashed foot and sock.

As brandy rides out the driveway on her old red bicycle, you begin to feel the full effect of the humid weather and the hot sun on Brandy's feet - she's always been quick to sweat. At your size, you can see through the small rips and tears in the punk grl's oldest sock - she wasn't fond of washing it. It lasted longer that way. The tears are like massive windows looking out on a valley of unwashed foot- and already the beads of sweat have begun to form.

A fat droplet lands on your face, smelling like the rest of your prison, only worse. You brush it off with disgust, your body already plenty drenched in the stuff from the day before. But then you realize - your lips are chapped and your throat is dry. You realize with dread that this young girl's stinky, sticky footsweat might be your only hope for surviving another day in her swamplike boot.

The heat skyrockets, and the sock around you begins to get moist and hot from Brandy's pedaling and the heat. The sock presses in on you, like a stormcloud full of sweat. The palefoot skin you can see in patches all around you is shiny in the dim light- you nearly retch at the growing smell and humidity.

You are soon pressed into puddles of the sweat, as more welled up from your presence on the insole. You are parched, and desperate. Do you give in to instinct and drink the punk's footsweat?
121112121112112111.title: Brandy misses her bus and bikes to school.

choices: Continue to drink from Brandy's foot
Try your luck with the her insole again
1211121211121121111.content:
You can't take it anymore...your mouth feels like a desert, and even if this sweat is from that bitch of a student Brandy, you can't bring yourself to care. You NEED to survive.

During a short second when Brandy's foot wasn't pushing down on you as harshly, you manage to flip over, now facing her worn-down insole. Despite your desperation and commitment to surviving this sweltering boot hell, you couldn't help but cringe; you are now pressed face down into the deep, moist imprint of her foot, the result of years of wearing these shoes. Now that you think about it, you don't remember a time when she wasn't wearing these beat-up knee-highs, even when she was a freshmen; you'd know, since the first day of school was the first day she got called down to your office for busting another girl's lip. Now what? You couldn't climb her, and you certainly couldn't get her attention from here. Was it time to give up? Time to embrace the microscopic crushing that was in your future? There wasn't anything you could do, right?

No, you were the mighty Tim! You never gave up inventing the shrinking device, despite most of the test ending up with dead test rats, and you'd not give up now. 143111122.content:
Paul died in those pipes. The air was stolen from his lungs until there was none left to steal. His body was thrown into the sewers like it was nothing but shit.

Paul had no friends. His parents both died at a young age. The shock from that hadn't worn off until he was 20. His grandparents did their best to help him do well in school, but it just wasn't the same as his real parents. He barely made it through highschool and into college, but the turmoil in his mind was climaxed. He couldn't handle the pressure, so he dropped out. A few days afterwards, he got used to the fact that his parents were dead. But there was no chance of him ever returning to college as a student, so he returned as a custodian.

Unbeknownst to Paul, someone was watching him during his years of being a jerk as a janitor. Her name was Sharon. She was a teacher at the college for at least twenty years, but in all those years, she'd never gotten married. She noticed Paul, and tried to become his friend. She saw under all of the sarcastic remarks and mean glares that inside he was lost. His poor soul had never experienced love, and Paul was clearly suffering from it. She said hello to him often and tried to have conversations with him, but Paul's shell was so thick that he never noticed her. He never made a note of her, despite her countless attempts to try and cure him.

On the night of the incident, Sharon called Paul's apartment. "Paul, it's Sharon. I know you're always forgetting me, but please, come to room 236 sometime in the morning. I know you don't care, but if you have any soul left in you, please, come hear what I have to say!" she put her hand over the phone for a moment and whispered "I love you...". The phone would not pick it up.

That morning, she went to use the restroom. She chose a stall at random, but little did she know that the stall she chose had a certain someone swimming in it's toilet: Paul. After she flushed, she went to her room. She walked into room 236, sat on her chair, and pleaded with begging eyes that Paul would walk by. He never came, but she was persistent. Every day for the rest of the school year, she waited. She prayed every night that she'd see him again, but she never did. However, the next year wasn't any different. She'd always look at the door of room 236 every morning, waiting, hoping...

And praying.

'Welcome to Camp Crescent, a summer park full of amusement and wonder for young women. Girls ages 13 through 19 are encouraged to spend their summers here, engaging in fun activities beyond their wildest dreams!'

That's what the sign said, anyway. She shook her head, and pinched the bridge of her nose. Here of all places?

This teenager wasn't even sure she could trust the sign, forget actually enter the camp. But for the next two months, it was here or the streets. And this was just barely the lesser of the two evils.

15221.content:
Head Counselor Kira looked over the file in her hands. "Miss Connie Roberts, age fifteen, from western Idaho, that's correct?"

Sitting across from her at the desk, Connie nodded. "Yup."

"Good." Kira slammed the file shut, and brushed a lock of hair from her face. "It said you've had family issues; an absent brother, an abusive father, a more abusive mother." Connie instinctively rubbed a bruise on her upper arm as Kira went on. "A rough life, so we've been somewhat lenient. Still, this is only the end of the first week of a two month journey, and you've made no friends, given two other campers burns on their legs, forced one counselor home screaming, and left the head chef in tears. We can't accept that, Connie."

"Okay, but the burns on those kids weren't really my fault."

Kira went on, ignoring the protests. "I'm sorry, but you've left us with no other choice. We can't send you home, since your parents already paid for this, and we can't let you keep tormenting the camp, so we'll have to use our most drastic punishment." She reached into her desk, and after a moment of digging around she pulled out a small syringe, filled with a neon green liquid.

Connie's eyes grew wide. "What is that?"

"Our solution to your trouble making." Kira leaped across her desk, and before Connie could react the needle was in her neck, the solution in her blood. The world turned dark, and began to spin. Connie's last sight was the counselor's grimace.


Connie woke up to a loud buzzing sound in her ear. It turned to a voice, saying, "Connie, this is Kira. I'm communicating to you with a remote earpiece. You can hear me, but I can't hear you. I know you're confused right now, but you've got another seven weeks to figure it out. Your challenge is to find me and get my attention. Only then will I give you the antidote. No one else knows your predicament, and no one else knows what to do. Good luck, and remember: Camp Crescent, where dreams turn to fun!"

Naked, cold, and a little confused, Connie stood up, taking in her surroundings. A large, rough plain served as her floor, but behind her was a giant mound of fabric, with a sour, salty smell.

"Oh my god..." She recognized the shape as a sock, but it was big. Way too big. The bitch Kira had shrunk her! Before Connie could think about anything else, she felt the ground rumble. Turning about, she watched in horror as a massive girl, maybe thirteen or fourteen, walked in, each step covering multiple football fields of distance. With a scream, Connie ran from the behemoth.

The well dressed bitch cracked open a case file. "Emily Sanders, just turned sixteen. It says here you've had some... trouble with your two younger sisters?"

"Stupid spoiled brats get everything," Emily scowled.

"Uh huh," the woman pursed her lips. "Be that as it may, do you really think they deserved all the punishment you gave them both?"

Emily brushed dark hair from her eyes. "...ayup."

The councillor lady's glasses slipped. "You tied one of them to a bed and tried to rape her!"

Emily's blue eyes maintained their gaze. "Little slut shouldn't have tried stealing my girlfriend."

The councillor slapped down Emily's case file. "Alright Emily, since you clearly have no empathy, I'm afraid we'll have to use something a little more drastic."

She opened up a little plastic case, containing two pills; the classic red and blue jelly beans.

"Now Emily, I'm afraid I must ask you to choose. Both pills are a suitable punishment for one such as yourself, however the effects of each differ slightly. Bear in mind that we are only doing this for your own good."

Emily eyeballed both pills in the innocent looking little case. One red. One blue. How the fuck were little pills supposed to help her and her stupid family get along again? It didn't make any sense!

But he wasn't getting out of here until she picked one. So with a sigh, Emily...

15231.content:
"Mister, can you please help me?"

You look down at the little girl and sigh. You needed the money, but this job was a pain in the ass. Who knew being a camp councilor was so god-damned difficult?

You bend over, stooping to her face level. "What is it, uhh, Susie?"

"There's something in the bathroom. It's scary."

You hold back your sigh. This was the fifth child who'd asked this. You'd shooed the other fourth away, stating your disbelief about the "toilet monster." That clearly didn't work.

"Yeah, I'll help."

Her face lit up, revealing a row of pink braces. "Thank you!" She ran off, and you trudged dutifully behind her.

You couldn't wait for this week to be over.



You slam your fist into the wooden door. The girl's outhouse was actually locked, but you still doubted there was a monster in it. "Hey, is anyone in there."

A masculine grunt came through. "Nope. The stall's empty. I'm just a spooky ghost. Run away now little girl."

Well fuck. There was a pedo in the stall. Should you call management? They'd like to know.

No, he'd run off by then. You pull the key out of your pocket. "Hey, I'm coming in. This restroom's for little girls, not grown men."

The door swings open. Standing over the toilet, covering himself, was a four foot tall, green and hairy ape man. Behind you, Susie screamed and ran off.

"What the actual fuck. There's a furry in here?"

He looks over his shoulder. "Not that I know off. Just me, pumpkin."

You rub your eyes. There was no way you were getting paid enough for this shit. "Okay little man, you're coming with me. This is no doubt against some law. At least, it should be."

He stepped out of the outhouse. "No can do, sweety. Busy monster, I am. Got places to do and people to go, or whatever. And you've seen too much." From a pouch wrapped around his waist, her grabs a handful of powder. "And who're you calling 'little?'"

Before you could react, he tossed the powder at you and ran off. The pinkish dust flowed into your lungs, choking you.

"Help... me..."

You stumble to the nearest cabin, and collapse in front of it.

15411.title: Hardness of be a Survivor

info.brief_description: A shrink story where the shrinkee must scrape to survive in a world of unaware people
info.description:
Few ground rules first

1) No extreme (<14) under age sex. Yes I know its just text but it skeeves me.

2) This is an unaware interactive. I don't mind if he gets found occasionally so long as the emphasis remains on unaware scenes. Now, if you want some ridiculous tale where every girl a shrunken guy meets wants to jam him down their pants for some strange reason, go elsewhere. This site has plenty of that trash.

3) All macrophilia fetishes are allowed and all sexual orientations as well. Though you should know I personally will focus on giantess related Chapters.

4) No one sentence chapters. Seriously you people who write these are the scum of the interactive world and need to take your short attention spans back to Pokemon land where they belong.

5) No describing women as being B-cups or Double Dees. If you seriously can not describe a breast without referencing its numeric bra size you need to stick to reading erotica and leave the writing of it to people who can manage at least 'dirty pillows' 'fun bags' 'gelatinous melons' or better.

6) Do Not Neglect Details of Survival. This is a story about how a shrunken person survives so don't forget to explain what he's eating, drinking, how he makes his clothes, what he uses as shelter, etc. etc.


Concept

This story will involve the travails of a human being who must sink to the lowest levels to survive as a victim of a shrinking accident. The focus will be on the character's struggle and on the devolution of his will and self respect throughout the story. I'll start off the story with a few possible characters and shrinking venues. These are summarized below.

Victim 1: John. John is an average kid until the accident. He has a cute girlfriend but her annoying siblings may be the death of him...literally.

Victim 2: Principal Deeds. You are a strict High School Principal who finds himself shrunk and at the mercy of his students.

Vicitm 3: Tim. Tim actually is a macrophile and a genius to boot. Will his perverted plans come to fruition or will a horrible accident teach him that shrinking is not all its cracked up to be?

Victim 4: Paul. A night janitor at the local college, you spill a strange variety of chemicals on yourself before going to clean the girl's lavatory. Needless to say you may never make it out.
